extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by CVE-2024-6235 or CVE-2024-6236 by retrieving the installed version of NetScaler Console, NetScaler SDX (SVM), or NetScaler Agent.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2024-6235 or CVE-2024-6236?

extracted_playbook.title: Update NetScaler Products
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected NetScaler products to the latest versions to mitigate the vulnerabilities.
